extendedInfo.description: West Bengal's capital, Kolkata is located on the east bank of the Hooghly river. Kolkata is East India's cultural, commercial and educational hub. A rapidly growing metropolitan and a developing city, Kolkata is a mesmerizing city that, once visited will be remembered always. âKolkataâ is a high-end offline/online tour guide Android application. It is your virtual travel guide to this enchanting city of East India. Get latest details from categories like Weather, Metro, Hotels, Must Visit, Nightlife, Emergency, Lingo Help, About App and Alert.  Know Kolkata in a better way to be able to see the vibrant capital of Bengalis. Weather: With a tropically wet and dry climate with Summers being hot and humid. Because Kolkata is near the sea, its temperature is uniform throughout the year. Yet, be informed of what the weather is going to be like outside, before stepping out. Use the app's Weather update feature. Metro: Kolkata Metro, a rapid transit system, has been one of the major modes of public transport for localities. It is one of the most preferred modes to reach a destination quickly by escaping the heavy road traffic. Get Metro Map from within the application with zoom in / zoom out facility.Hotels: Stay at the most luxurious hotels. The app provides detailed info about hotels' ratings, location details, cuisine served, contact info, etc.Must Visit: Kolkata is a hot-spot vacation attraction in the East of India. Visit places like Academy of Fine Arts, Asiatic Society, Indian Museum, Jorashanko Thakurbari, Dalhousie Square, College Street, Esplanade, Kumartuli, Fort Willim, Victoria Memorial, Eden Gardens, Birla Planetarium, Howrah Bridge, Marble Palace, Nicco Park and Saheed Minar. All the related details of the mentioned places are mentioned. Nightlife: Kolkata is famous for some of the best discotheques and pubs. Its nightlife is vivacious and lively. Spend time and relax at places with the best ambiance such as Mocambo, Bar-B-Q, Someplace Else Pub, Tantra, Chowman, Peter Cat, Shisha, Wasted Friday and Freaky Fridays. The application contains full details. Emergency: While you stay in Kolkata, be informed about the various emergency numbers such as Airlines, Medical, Crime, Railways, Tourist Enquiry, from the given list. Lingo Help: Internet Connectivity is required to use Lingo Help. The default translation is to English language, which eases communication at large with localities. Kolkata is bundled with hardcore latest updates and offers ease to the user. Visit and enjoy your stay in Kolkata via Kolkata application for Android Smart Phones! Note: All information is indicative to help the user best navigate through the Kolkata and is taken from various web sites. No content of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch- Though the Design and presentation of the application is copyrighted by Silver Touch Technologies Ltd,. India.
